articles.author: Matina Stevis-Gridneff
articles.content: Minister Ngs counterparts have repeatedly assured her that these measures will not affect vaccine shipments to Canada, Ms. Han said.Canada depends on the European Union for nearly its entire vaccine … [+2172 chars]
articles.description: The European Union presented new emergency rules that will most likely severely cut exports to Britain and other countries to ease supply shortages at home.
articles.title: E.U. Will Curb Covid Vaccine Exports for 6 Weeks - The New York Times

articles.description: The automaker said it will focus activities in regions where it expects to sell most cars. Its market share in Europe is 0.4 percent.
articles.title: Honda will sell British car plant to logistics giant Panattoni - Automotive News Europe
